Package com.sun.squawk.peripheral

Interface Summary
INorFlashSector Define a segment of memory which is defined as being of type NOR Flash.
INorFlashSectorAllocator INorFlashSectorAllocator is part of the implementation of the Record Management Store (see RecordStore).
IPeripheral  
 

Class Summary
PeripheralRegistry Place holder for all peripheral types known by Squawk.
SimulatedNorFlashSector I am a class that allows the RMS store to be used in Java heap as a byte array.
SimulatedNorFlashSectorAllocator  
 

Exception Summary
InsufficientFlashMemoryException
